夫.definition: (classical) this, that; he, she, they; (exclamatory final particle); (initial particle, introduces an opinion)

夫唱婦隨.definition: fig. the man sings and the woman follows; fig. marital harmony

夫妻反目.definition: man and wife fall out (idiom, from Book of Changes); marital strife

夫妻相.definition: similarity in features of an old couple; common facial traits that show predestination to be married together

夫妻肺片.definition: popular Sichuan cold dish made of thinly sliced beef and beef offal

夫婦.definition: a (married) couple; husband and wife; CL:對|对[dui4]

夫子.definition: Master (old form of address for teachers, scholars); (used sarcastically) pedant

夫子自道.definition: appearing to be praising others while actually praising yourself; one's criticism of others exposes one's own faults

夫家.definition: husband's family (traditionally where the wife moves into)

夫餘.definition: Pu'yo, Korean Buyeo (c. 200 BC-494 AD), ancient kingdom in northeast frontier region of China
